dcterms:creator: Sebastian Riedel
Limin Yao
Andrew McCallum
dcterms:description: The NYT dataset was generated by aligning Freebase with the New York Times corpus, containing articles from 2005 to 2006 for training and articles from 2007 for testing. It includes 53 distinct relation types and consists of 570K sentences in the training set and 170K sentences in the test set.
dcterms:title: NYT dataset
